definitions.definition: A person of minor significance , accomplishment or acclaim ; a common and undistinguished person.
A member of a socioeconomic class between the upper ranks of society and the agricultural workers .

main_definition: A person of minor significance , accomplishment or acclaim ; a common and undistinguished person.
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A member of a socioeconomic class between the upper ranks of society and the agricultural workers .
